video.title: Alaska State Troopers
video.synopsis: Chronicling the adventures of Alaska state troopers, this reality series puts a cold-weather spin on the everyday challenges of law enforcement.

episodes.synopsis: One trooper responds to a domestic disturbance call involving a chainsaw, while another encounters a man wielding a 15-inch knife and a rifle.
episodes.title: Alaska Chainsaw Massacre

episodes.synopsis: One trooper searches for the victim of a snow-machine accident, another tracks a knife-wielding assailant and a third engages in a high-speed chase.
episodes.title: Knife Fight

episodes.synopsis: A trooper races to help rescue a disabled man from a fire, but circumstances around the home make it nearly impossible.
episodes.title: Fatal Inferno

episodes.synopsis: Two troopers search for a man wielding a machete, who's already left one victim with a broken jaw. But finding him is only the beginning.
episodes.title: Bloody Warrior

episodes.synopsis: Troopers confront a man with a rifle who's threatening to kill someone, deal with belligerent fishermen and pursue a suspect on a motorcycle.
episodes.title: Shotgun Showdown

episodes.synopsis: Troopers shut down a bootleg operation and race a fleeing thief to the airport. Meanwhile, a traffic stop nabs a notorious -- and armed -- meth cook.
episodes.title: Armed and Bootlegging

episodes.synopsis: As one trooper tries to decide whether he's looking at human or animal remains, two colleagues patrol the salmon-rich waters of Prince Cove.
episodes.title: Campground Crazies

episodes.synopsis: When the suspects in a car chase flee the vehicle, a lone trooper fears that following them on foot may lead him into an ambush in the forest.
episodes.title: Grizzly-pendence Day

episodes.synopsis: A road rage incident risks turning deadly when someone pulls a gun and an agitated man holds his pregnant girlfriend at gunpoint.
episodes.title: Hostage Standoff

episodes.synopsis: A wildlife trooper must remove a man who's been squatting on public land for more than a year and may be armed and dangerous.
episodes.title: Armed & Squatting

episodes.synopsis: Trooper Joseph Hess is on the trail of one of Alaska's worst meth dealers, who leaves behind his car and his girlfriend as he tries to flee.
episodes.title: Meth Dealer Manhunt

episodes.synopsis: A trooper responds to a car accident call to find a woman pinned underneath the vehicle and fuel beginning to leak.
episodes.title: Son and a Gun

episodes.synopsis: Troopers must deal with the human cost of massive flooding that's demolished homes and endangered thousands of Alaskans.
episodes.title: Drunk and Dangerous

episodes.synopsis: A sting operation and a stealthy stakeout highlight the takedown of a meth cook who's also stockpiling stolen guns.
episodes.title: Crystal Meth Compound

episodes.synopsis: In the aftermath of a house fire that killed an elderly woman, trooper Massey searches for clues of foul play.
episodes.title: Trooper Stalker

episodes.synopsis: In the wake of an officer's shooting during a routine traffic stop, a trooper must stop a belligerent, weaving driver who he fears may be armed.
episodes.title: Deep Woods Standoff

episodes.synopsis: Trooper Matthew Determan races to a backwoods home to stop two drunken brothers from escalating their already destructive feud.
episodes.title: Blacked Out & Belligerent

episodes.synopsis: While a trooper lays down spike strips to stop a fleeing suspect in Fairbanks, the icy roads may end the pursuit first.
episodes.title: Hot Drugs, Icy Streets

episodes.synopsis: Wildlife trooper Jon Simeon pursues a caribou poacher onto a frozen lake. Meanwhile, a drunk man has troopers pinned down in a gun battle.
episodes.title: Too Much Pot

episodes.synopsis: A pair of troopers race the rapidly dropping temperatures to find the pilot of a helicopter that crashed in the forest.
episodes.title: Chopper Down

episodes.synopsis: Against the backdrop of the Iditarod, troopers square off with a man at a gas station whom they suspect is trying to get rid of his drugs.
episodes.title: Trail of Blood

episodes.synopsis: Troopers make arrests in a call to a hotel, a neighborhood feud escalates and brown bears raid a town dump.
episodes.title: Lock 'N' Load Neighbors

episodes.synopsis: Troopers track an escapee from a mental facility, rescue an injured hiker and deal with hunters who've bagged more than the limit.
episodes.title: Loaded for Bear

episodes.synopsis: Trooper Joe Miller chases a man who's been threatening campers in Seward with a knife, while Lopez and Taylor track a wanted felon.
episodes.title: Bear Aware

episodes.synopsis: A suspicious smell near an abandoned campsite may be a dead body, and troopers believe a dangerous suspect may have something to do with a car crash.
episodes.title: Smell of Death

episodes.synopsis: In Fairbanks, troopers chase a vehicle carrying stolen weapons. Meanwhile, officers rescue stranded campers.
episodes.title: Burglars & Bears

episodes.synopsis: As his fellow officers keep Independence Day celebrations under control, Trooper Dahl searches for a missing family of moose hunters.
episodes.title: Hammered on the Holiday

episodes.synopsis: This extended episode finds the troopers with their hands full  with the rise in crime during the summer recreation season.
episodes.title: Carnival Chaos

episodes.synopsis: The troopers pull drunken drivers from the state's most dangerous highway and unexpectedly walk into a knife attack in a remote village.
episodes.title: Battling Demons

episodes.synopsis: When troopers are fired upon, it leads to a face-off between the Alaskan state police and a man armed with a shotgun.
episodes.title: Shotgun Standoff

episodes.synopsis: In this extended episode, troopers carry out mountaintop rescues via helicopter and pursue criminals in south central Alaska.
episodes.title: Frozen Justice

episodes.synopsis: In this extended episode, troopers face a man who's barricaded himself in a house and a drunken gold miner who's blocking the highway.
episodes.title: Wildest Calls

episodes.synopsis: An armed and wanted man leads troopers on a chase through the woods, a bear takes up residence in a village and troopers pursue bootleggers.
episodes.title: Guns, Cash, & Coke

episodes.synopsis: Troopers nab a drug trafficker, while their wildlife counterparts investigate several trucks that have damaged a nature preserve.
episodes.title: Meth, Knives, & Spears

episodes.synopsis: Troopers deal with a forest fire edging toward Fairbanks and try to negotiate with an armed man in a tense showdown.
episodes.title: Burning Alaska

episodes.synopsis: Troopers encounter a bear while searching for illegal moose hunters, detain an intoxicated fisherman and find a stolen gun.
episodes.title: One in the Chamber

episodes.synopsis: Troopers search for a man who's threatening to kill his mother; a team of troopers competes against Canadian Mounties in a shooting competition.
episodes.title: Crawl Space Capture
